name: steem-wise-core
description: Node/web library for Wise: a vote delegation system for STEEM blockchain

scripts.check: if echo "$(node --version)" | grep -q "$(cat .nvmrc)"; then echo "Node version correct"; else echo "Node version does not match that in .nvmrc" && exit 1; fi
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-node: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run build-schema
scripts.build-browser: npm run check && rm -rf dist/browser/ && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-browser-dev: npm run check && rm -rf dist/browser/ && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.test: npm run check && mocha -r ts-node/register test/unit/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.verify: npm run check && mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.debug: npm run check && npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md

author: The Wise Team (https://wise-team.io/)
